servinfo.title: Timing Chain Cover Cleaning and Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Timing Chain Cover Removal and Installation:For J20 Engine

servinfosub.title: Clean
servinfosub.ptxt: Clean sealing surface on timing chain cover, crank case, cylinder block and cylinder head.
Remove oil, old sealant, and dust from sealing surface.

servinfosub.title: Inspection
servinfosub.ptxt: Check oil seal lip for fault or other damage. Replace as necessary.
